name: XJack Seven-Mode Collection
description: Complete XJack digital art collection with seven unique screensaver experiences - Christmas 2024 Edition
author: CoreyMillia

modes.name: Original XJack
modes.description: Classic horror typewriter from The Shining

modes.name: Back Room
modes.description: Dark poetry saga with haunting narrative

modes.name: Dogs & Motorbikes
modes.description: Musical comedy anthem with full song structure

modes.name: System Error
modes.description: Tech apocalypse with escalating system failures

modes.name: Symbol Storm
modes.description: Rainbow chaos with full-screen symbol explosion

modes.name: Terminal Hacker
modes.description: Authentic matrix coding with 3-minute rain finale

modes.name: Hacked Terminal
modes.description: System invasion thriller - realistic hacker takeover

features: Dynamic visual effects and color coding
Real functional code (matrix C code actually works)
notes: The Hacked Terminal mode is so realistic it can cause adrenaline rush!
Created during Christmas Eve/Day 2024 coding session
Complete backup available in XJackBackups directory
Each mode has unique personality and visual styling
